entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [internal/8.0.1xx] Installer CI build is failing due to missing packages - TemplatePackageDownloader project #42672
  • [Linux]There are some warnings "Warning: Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload pack 'Microsoft.NET.Runtime.Emscripten.Node.net8' in manifest ..." when running "dotnet workload update" in CMD after installing SDK 8.0.400 and SDK 9.0.100-preview.7 #42667

Closed

  • Unable to install maui-android workload on Archlinux #42676

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42677
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support globbing filter for dotnet test #42670
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42665
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42664
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Download rsync if using mariner #42628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Find baseline workload set in 8.0.100 folder #42435
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.9
  • Drop FirstTimeMessageAspNetCertificateLinux #42519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Maybe permit users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • Find all workloads! Even if they're in another feature band Fixes #42502 #42513
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Replace obsolete nuget api in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation" #42648
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2513776 #42570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #42630
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Always print manifest versions in workload list command #42653
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include LA64 in supported ILCompiler RIDs #42657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
